text: Hanki Israeli vahe'ma ru moparegama kina ome hu'za mani'naza vahe'ma ete mopa zamire'ma esanu'za, mopama erisna zana Fonesia vahe mopa atupareti agafa huteno, vuvava huno noti kaziga Zarefati mopare vanige'za eri'za manigahaze. Jerusalemi kumapi vahe'ma zamavare'za noti kazigama kinama ome huzmante'naza vahe'mo'za Negevi mopafima me'nea ranra kumatamimpi emanigahaze.
